name: Sky High Yorkshire Pudding
author: Ronismom
summary: Here is recipe I came up with while cooking roast beef dinner. These Yorkies stay tall and have a perfect hollow centre for lots of yummy gravy.
directions: Preheat the oven to 450 degrees F (230 degrees C)
In a large bowl, whisk together the eggs and milk until well blended
Whisk in the flour one cup at a time until frothy and well blended
Distribute the oil equally among 12 muffin cups, a little over a teaspoon per cup
Place in the oven for 5 to 10 minutes, until smoking
Remove from the oven and quickly ladle about 1/4 cup of batter into each cup
Bake for 30 to 35 minutes in the preheated oven
I turn my oven off and leave the door partially open with the yorkies inside to keep them from deflating while waiting for everyone to ask for seconds
